sourcesContent:
<template>
<input type="text" v-model="task" />
  <button @click="createTask">Create task</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "Settings",
  data() {
    return {
      task: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    createTask() {
      this.$emit("taskCreated", this.task);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
